text: The 2017 Rally Australia (formally the 26. Kennards Hire Rally Australia 2017) was the 13th and final round of the 2017 World Rally Championship. The rally was held over three days between 17 November and 19 November 2017, and was based in Coffs Harbour, Australia. Thierry Neuville and Nicolas Gilsoul were the rally winners. ==Entry list== {| | {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="font-size: 85%" ! scope=row colspan="7" style="text-align: center;" | Notable entrants |- ! scope=col | ! scope=col | Entrant ! scope=col | ! scope=col | Driver ! scope=col | Co-driver ! scope=col | Car ! scope=col | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 1 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 2 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text- align: center;" | 3 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 4 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 5 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text- align: center;" | 6 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 7 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 8 | Citroën Total Abu Dhabi WRT | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 9 | Citroën Total Abu Dhabi WRT | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text- align: center;" | 10 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 11 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 21 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text- align: center;" | 31 | | align="center" | | | | | align="center" | |- ! colspan="7" |Source: |} | valign="top" | {| align="right" class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" |- ! colspan="2" | Key |- !
